TopicTitle: Mission Progress beyond Eve and Duna

Articles.Content:
Hi,

so I started to pick up KSP again a few weeks ago.

IÃ‚Â´m having a lot of fun in the career mode, but IÃ‚Â´m at a point where I only get the same old contracts. http://i.imgur.com/eJ1mIqR.png

Is there a trigger for new contracts IÃ‚Â´m missing or even a contract counter to unlock new ones.

My Tech tree is maxed out, all buildings are maxed with the exception of both assembly buildings (lvl2).

The only contracts I avoided completely where the surveys on Kerbin and all "Zone" contracts (temperature etc) outside of the mun.

(Is it maybe a reputation thing?)

Thanks for the help in advance.

Edited January 10, 2015 by timoles

It's probably your reputation, you have negative rep and are only getting 1 star contracts coming up.If you're using a strategy that's swapping rep for money/science you should probably turn it off now that everything's upgraded.

Thats it thank you very much.

I feel stupid for not figuring it out for myself and thinking reputation was useless.

http://i.imgur.com/4KVmqpw.png

I guess i got some new objectives thank you again, I need to go and plan some kerbal rescue missions for upcoming disast.... planed touchdowns.
